channel.title: RSPoser Help
channel.description:
IK RSPoser isn't talked about much now, but I need a little help. Whenever I try to open a .dat file with it, it says "Access violation at address 004785D0 in Module 'Poser.exe'. Read of address 00000000"
Just wondering how to fix this.

item.title: RSPoser Help
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
